job_title: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Front Desk Receptionist in North Haven, CT
pros: Enjoy working with staff and patients
cons: Not being able to complete all the problems that cam happens at that time.

pros: Great benefits and PTO. Great atmosphere

job_title: Student Nurse Technician in New Haven, CT
pros: The orientation was informative and made me feel as though they understood what each student nurse was going through as they started working in the hospital enviornment
cons: Some of the nurses were not that nice. Technicians that have been on floors for years are treated differently than those that have not.  I hardly ever recieved any positive feed back and when i did it never got to management.

review_title: Great Communnity Hospital with great Learning experiences
pros: A small community Hospital where learning is able to be done. Co-workers are friendly and always willing to help. Most PCMs give great feedback to their employees.
cons: The only con is the pay is less than Yale and the 401 K is not  matched.

job_title: Senior Respiratory Therapist in Southwick, MA
pros: great organization. left in 2002 to raise children, loved coworkers.  Would love to return to this type of organization.
cons: In general minimal cons, felt very supportive by staff.
